sentences.sContent: Poach the fish until it flakes easily.
sentences.sCn: 把鱼炖到一碰就碎为止。

sentences.sContent: Remove the skin and flake the flesh.
sentences.sCn: 去皮后把肉切成小薄片。

remMethod.val: f(看作fly， 飞) + lake(湖) → 飞向湖中的薄片 → 使成薄片

words.tran: 薄片的；薄而易剥落的；古里古怪的

trans.tranOther: to break fish or another food into small thin pieces, or to break in this way
